required_clauses.name: Governing Law
required_clauses.text: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction].

required_clauses.name: Indemnification
required_clauses.text: Each party agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the other party...

required_clauses.name: Force Majeure
required_clauses.text: Neither party shall be liable for any failure or delay in performance under this Agreement due to events beyond its reasonable control.

required_clauses.name: Confidentiality
required_clauses.text: All information exchanged between the parties will be treated as confidential.
